fields.summary: Alloy: Android Module XML does not work?

comments.body: <Module> isn't supported until Alloy 1.2.0, which is unreleased. Are you using the version of Alloy from the master branch?
Ha! That might explain why. My bad, i was sure it was a new feature in 1.1
Closing it as per comments from Tony/Mads.
